entities.name: coote
entities.description: Coote is a person who is grinning broadly. He chose to aim the next Bludger at Harper instead.

entities.name: harper
entities.description: Harper is a person who was just passing Harry in the opposite direction. Coote aimed the Bludger at him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who was pleased to hear the dull thunk that meant the Bludger had found its mark.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is a team that seemed as though they could do no wrong. They scored again and again.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who saved goals with apparent ease. He was smiling now.

relationships.description: Coote aimed the Bludger at Harper instead of Harry.
Harry is a part of Gryffindor team.
Ron is a part of Gryffindor team.
Harper collided with Harry hard and deliberately.
